Depuis juillet 2021, j'occupe les fonctions de Directeur g√©n√©ral des services au Muretain agglo, EPCI r√©unissant 26 communes, environ 126 000 habitants, au sud de Toulouse. C‚Äôest un territoire dynamique, en forte croissance d√©mographique, et un √©tablissement intercommunal de 1800 agents, tr√®s tourn√© vers les services √† la population, qui d√©veloppe progressivement un projet de territoire ambitieux.

general.description:
Welcome on my profile,

Project manager with over 6 years of experience closely related to transport and new mobility issues.
  
I am more particularly interested in the establishment of new strategies and business models for the development of sustainable and innovative mobility services and initiatives. 

To get a good idea about my professional interests and personal commitments, please have a look at my twitter profile: @FMaugere   

Attentive to new business opportunities.
general.school: Ecole nationale des Ponts et Chauss√©es

jobs.description:
In order to better understand the way is established the mobility public policy, and get more directly involved in its animation, I decided to join the agglomeration community of Saint Quentin en Yvelines (SQY). 
Located 20 kilometers from Paris city center, SQY is the second economic cluster of Paris Region after la D√©fense. 
With around 145 000 employees and very important daily commutting issues (70% coming in / 60% coming out), mobility is a strategic issue of this territory and its attractivity. 
In addition, SQY is investing a lot in the development of innovative mobility solutions and the study of their uses, especially in collaboration with other territories part of Paris Saclay. 

Therefore, I have been particularly interested in the position of ¬´ Innovative Mobilities' project manager ¬ª which is mainly organised between the construction and steering of new mobility solutions and / or services, such as the Viago ! calculator or the experimentation of auonomous shuttles, and the animation of users‚Äô communities with a particular focus on companies and their salarees.
I also participate in the MoveInSaclay intiative which intends to transform, thanks to digital and data analysis, the mobility management by the various actors (both public and private) in the territories.

Arrived in Transdev within the innovation department, I have been in charge of supporting operation managers on creating new business opportunities or operation processes by using open innovation methodologies. 
This experience enabled me to discover the numerous operations undertaken by Transdev, especially on demand activities, the mobility of persons with reduced mobility and new services around hubs for surbubs and rural areas.

Since January 2016, located in the South of the Paris region, within a marketing department I am in charge of the development of the numerous bus networks governed by "Ile de France Mobilit√©s", the Parisian Public Transport Authority.
My responsibilites also include the animation of new partnerships and the creation of new business opportunities especially around the development of the Paris Saclay cluster.

‚Ä¢ Study of new developments and optimisation for bus services in the Paris region
‚Ä¢ Response to call for tenders for private / public businesses 
‚Ä¢ Establishment of new partnerships with public institutions, enterprises, associations... 
‚Ä¢ Implementation of new mobility services / Project manager of the PROTOBUS project in partnership with the Paris Saclay Public Planning Establishment
‚Ä¢ Animation of creative sessions and open innovation meetings / Laureate of the DRIM'in Saclay Challenge 2017
‚Ä¢ Monitoring on new business opportunities including digital services

jobs.companyName: UIC (Union Internationale des Chemins de fer)
jobs.description:
Tr√®s int√©ress√© par les politiques publiques europ√©ennes en mati√®re de transport et d√©sireux de poursuivre ma connaissance du milieu europ√©en et de me constituer un r√©seau dans ce domaine des transports, j‚Äôai donc fait le choix d‚Äôint√©grer l‚ÄôUnion Internationale des Chemins de fer √† Bruxelles. 
Sous la responsabilit√© du directeur des affaires europ√©ennes, mes missions m‚Äôont permis d‚Äôacqu√©rir de nouvelles comp√©tences sur la gestion de projets ainsi que sur les m√©canismes de financements europ√©ens pour des initiatives de recherche. 
Cette exp√©rience fut √©galement tr√®s formatrice sur le plan politique et la compr√©hension des enjeux  europ√©ens actuels dans le domaine des transports et plus particuli√®rement au sein du ferroviaire. Mes missions furent enfin l‚Äôopportunit√© de gagner de nouvelles connaissances techniques li√©es √† l‚Äôing√©nierie et  l‚Äô√©conomie des transports. 

‚Ä¢ Gestion de projets europ√©ens en mati√®re de recherche transport (7√®me Programme Cadre / Horizon 2020)
‚Ä¢ Membre du secr√©tariat du Conseil Europ√©en de la Recherche Ferroviaire (ERRAC), charg√© de la coordination entre les principaux repr√©sentants europ√©ens du secteur ferroviaire, les institutions europ√©ennes et repr√©sentants des Etats membres pour les politiques de transport
‚Ä¢ R√©daction de documents de r√©f√©rence en mati√®re de R&D et innovation pour la communaut√© ferroviaire europ√©enne 
‚Ä¢ Coordination de la cr√©ation du site Railway-Research.org d√©di√© √† la recherche ferroviaire internationale
‚Ä¢ Responsable de l‚Äôorganisation et de la communication des ‚ÄúUIC Innovation Awards‚Äù 2012 et 2014

Afin de valoriser ma formation en √©tudes internationales et europ√©ennes en master √† l'IEP de Grenoble, j'ai fait le choix de d√©couvrir en stage durant 6 mois √† Bruxelles le monde du conseil. 

Cette d√©cision faisait √©galement suite √† ma participation au concours de lobbying inter √©coles organis√© par le cabinet Spin Partners durant mon ann√©e de M2. Nous avions mont√© en √©quipe un plan de lobbying ayant trait √† la politique europ√©enne du march√© carbone pour le compte d‚Äôune f√©d√©ration industrielle fran√ßaise. 

Au sein du cabinet Euralia, acteur reconnu dans le milieu europ√©en du lobbying et des affaires publiques, j'ai appris √† travers les missions qui m'ont √©t√© confi√©es le sens de l‚Äôefficacit√© et de l‚Äôorganisation n√©cessaires afin de r√©pondre au plus pr√®s des besoins clients tant institutionnels qu‚Äô√©conomiques dans leurs strat√©gies politiques et de communication. 
Cette exp√©rience fut aussi l‚Äôopportunit√© de comprendre sur le terrain, le fonctionnement des diff√©rentes institutions europ√©ennes.

‚Ä¢ Veille concurrentielle sur les politiques fran√ßaises et europ√©ennes de R&D
